title: Remove 6 selected gallery images from the Gallery grid data source

requirements.summary: Remove the 6 specified gallery image entries from the gallery data array so they no longer render and the grid reflows without empty slots while preserving modal and “View More” behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The Gallery section no longer renders the 6 selected images in the grid.
The gallery grid has no blank/empty placeholders where those images used to be; remaining items reflow naturally.
The modal viewer continues to work for the remaining images (click-to-open and close behavior remains intact).
No other gallery elements are changed (e.g., keep the existing “View More” button link and behavior unchanged).

file_operations.description: Delete ONLY the six specified image objects from the exported galleryImages array by removing the entries whose src values are: generated/gallery-work-07.dim_1200x1600.jpg, generated/gallery-work-08.dim_1200x1600.jpg, generated/gallery-real-17.dim_1200x1600.jpg, generated/gallery-real-21.dim_1200x1600.jpg, generated/gallery-real-27.dim_1200x1600.jpg, generated/gallery-real-28.dim_1200x1600.jpg. Do not change any other entries, metadata, or ordering beyond removing these items, so the Gallery grid naturally reflows and the modal continues to operate for remaining images.
